text:
@KarlRove 92,333 Covid 19 deaths in the USA as of May 20

That's approximately:
• 23,000 Benghazi deaths
• 30 9-11 attacks 
• 5 full NBA basketball arenas leveled
• 2 capacity NASCAR events obliterated

When will any investigations into Trump's fumbled Coronavirus response start?
